title: "aMeta Workshop at Mersin"
date: "31 January 2023"

Welcome to the **aMeta: an accurate and memory-efficient ancient Metagenomic profiling workflow** course that will be held in Mersin University, Department of Biotechnology in the scope of the European Union funded [NEOMATRIX](https://neomatrix.metu.edu.tr/) collaboration project.

In this web page, we aim to publish the tutorial material of aMeta ancient metagenomic profiling workflow.

**aMeta** [Pochon, Bergfeldt et al., 2022](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2022.10.03.510579v1.abstract) is designed to analyse the microbial content in ancient specimens from a wide variety of source organisms (including humans).

Please find the whole pipeline through this [github repo](https://github.com/NBISweden/aMeta)
